description: The file defines a UI component named 'Card' using the Lightning.js framework. It sets up properties, a visual template, initial state, and initialization logic for the Card component, intended to display a title and body text within a styled surface.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the reactive state variables for the component, including dimensions, colors, texts, and layout parameters.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the component state based on the provided props, setting width, height, title, and body text.

search-terms: UI surface with title and body
